arabic: الۤرٰ ۗتِلْكَ اٰيٰتُ الْكِتٰبِ وَقُرْاٰنٍ مُّبِيْنٍ  ۔
transliteration_en: Alif-Laaam-Raa; tilka Aayaatul Kitaabi wa Qur-aa-nim Mubeen
transliteration_id: Alif lām rā, tilka āyātul-kitābi wa qur'ānim mubīn(in).
translation_en: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
translation_id: Alif Lām Rā. Itulah ayat-ayat Kitab, yaitu (ayat-ayat) Al-Qur’an yang memberi penjelasan.

arabic: رُبَمَا يَوَدُّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا لَوْ كَانُوْا مُسْلِمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Rubamaa yawaddul lazeena kafaroo law kaanoo muslimeen
transliteration_id: Rubamā yawaddul-lażīna kafarū lau kānū muslimīn(a).
translation_en: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
translation_id: Orang-orang yang kufur itu sering kali (nanti di akhirat) menginginkan, sekiranya mereka dahulu (di dunia) menjadi orang-orang muslim.

arabic: ذَرْهُمْ يَأْكُلُوْا وَيَتَمَتَّعُوْا وَيُلْهِهِمُ الْاَمَلُ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Zarhum yaakuloo wa tatamatta'oo wa yulhihimul amalu fasawfa ya'lamoon
transliteration_id: Żarhum ya'kulū wa yatamatta‘ū wa yulhihimul-amalu fa saufa ya‘lamūn(a).
translation_en: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
translation_id: Biarkanlah mereka (di dunia ini) makan, bersenang-senang, dan dilalaikan oleh angan-angan (kosong). Kelak mereka akan mengetahui (akibat perbuatannya).

arabic: وَمَآ اَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَرْيَةٍ اِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٌ مَّعْلُوْمٌ
transliteration_en: Wa maaa ahlaknaa min qaryatin illaa wa lahaa kitaabum ma'loom
transliteration_id: Wa mā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā wa lahā kitābum ma‘lūm(un).
translation_en: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
translation_id: Kami tidak membinasakan suatu negeri, kecuali sudah ada ketentuan yang ditetapkan baginya.

arabic: مَا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ اُمَّةٍ اَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَأْخِرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Maa tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahaa wa maa yastaakhiroon
transliteration_id: Mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wa mā yasta'khirūn(a).
translation_en: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
translation_id: Tidak ada satu umat pun yang dapat menyegerakan ajalnya dan tidak (pula) menangguhkan(-nya).

arabic: وَقَالُوْا يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْ نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ اِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُوْنٌ  ۗ
transliteration_en: Wa qaaloo yaaa aiyuhal lazee nuzzila 'alaihiz Zikru innaka lamajnoon
transliteration_id: Wa qālū yā ayyuhal-lażī nuzzila ‘alaihiż-żikru innaka lamajnūn(un).
translation_en: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Wahai orang yang kepadanya diturunkan Al-Qur’an, sesungguhnya engkau (Nabi Muhammad) benar-benar orang gila.

arabic: لَوْمَا تَأْتِيْنَا بِالْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةِ اِنْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الصّٰدِقِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Law maa taateenaa bil malaaa'ikati in kunta minas saadiqeen
transliteration_id: Lau mā ta'tīnā bil-malā'ikati in kunta minaṣ-ṣādiqīn(a).
translation_en: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
translation_id: Mengapa engkau tidak mendatangkan malaikat kepada kami, jika engkau termasuk orang-orang yang benar?”

arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ الْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةَ اِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوْٓا اِذًا مُّنْظَرِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Maa nunazzilul malaaa'i kata illaa bilhaqqi wa maa kaanooo izam munzareen
transliteration_id: Mā nunazzilul-malā'ikata illā bil-ḥaqqi wa mā kānū iżam munẓarīn(a).
translation_en: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
translation_id: Kami tidak menurunkan malaikat, kecuali dengan kebenaran. (Jika orang-orang kafir itu mengingkarinya,) mereka tidak diberi penangguhan (dari azab Allah).

arabic: اِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا الذِّكْرَ وَاِنَّا لَهٗ لَحٰفِظُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Innaa Nahnu nazalnaz Zikra wa Innaa lahoo lahaa fizoon
transliteration_id: Innā naḥnu nazzalnaż-żikra wa innā lahū laḥāfiẓūn(a).
translation_en: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kamilah yang menurunkan Al-Qur’an dan pasti Kami (pula) yang memeliharanya.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ اَرْسَلْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِكَ فِيْ شِيَعِ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad arsalnaa min qablika fee shiya'il awwaleen
transliteration_id: Wa laqad arsalnā min qablika fī syiya‘il-awwalīn(a).
translation_en: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah mengutus (beberapa rasul) sebelum engkau (Nabi Muhammad) kepada umat-umat terdahulu.

arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيْهِمْ مِّنْ رَّسُوْلٍ اِلَّا كَانُوْا بِهٖ يَسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa maa yaateehim mir Rasoolin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
transliteration_id: Wa mā ya'tīhim mir rasūlin illā kānū bihī yastahzi'ūn(a).
translation_en: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
translation_id: Tidaklah datang seorang rasul kepada mereka, kecuali selalu memperolok-olokkannya.

arabic: كَذٰلِكَ نَسْلُكُهٗ فِيْ قُلُوْبِ الْمُجْرِمِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: kazaalika naslukuhoo fee quloobil mujrimeen
transliteration_id: Każālika naslukuhū fī qulūbil-mujrimīn(a).
translation_en: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
translation_id: Demikianlah, Kami memasukkannya (olok-olok itu) ke dalam hati orang-orang yang berdosa.

arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِهٖ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ سُنَّةُ الْاَوَّلِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Laa yu'minoona bihee wa qad khalat sunnatul awwaleen
transliteration_id: Lā yu'minūna bihī wa qad khalat sunnatul-awwalīn(a).
translation_en: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
translation_id: Mereka tidak beriman kepadanya (Al-Qur’an), padahal telah berlalu sunatullah terhadap orang-orang terdahulu.

arabic: وَلَوْ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ بَابًا مِّنَ السَّمَاۤءِ فَظَلُّوْا فِيْهِ يَعْرُجُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa law fatahnaa 'alaihim baabam minas samaaa'i fazaloo feehi ya'rujoon
transliteration_id: Wa lau fataḥnā ‘alaihim bābam minas-samā'i fa ẓallū fīhi ya‘rujūn(a).
translation_en: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
translation_id: Kalau Kami bukakan (salah satu) pintu langit untuk mereka, lalu mereka terus menerus naik ke atasnya,

arabic: لَقَالُوْٓا اِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتْ اَبْصَارُنَا بَلْ نَحْنُ قَوْمٌ مَّسْحُوْرُوْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Laqaaloo innamaa sukkirat absaarunaa bal nahnu qawmum mashooroon
transliteration_id: Laqālū innamā sukkirat abṣārunā bal naḥnu qaumum masḥūrūn(a).
translation_en: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
translation_id: tentulah mereka berkata, “Sesungguhnya pandangan kamilah yang dikaburkan. Bahkan, kami adalah kaum yang terkena sihir.”

arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى السَّمَاۤءِ بُرُوْجًا وَّزَيَّنّٰهَا لِلنّٰظِرِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad ja'alnaa fissamaaa'i buroojanw wa zaiyannaahaa linnaazireen
transliteration_id: Wa laqad ja‘alnā fis-samā'i burūjaw wa zayyannāhā lin-nāẓirīn(a).
translation_en: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah menciptakan gugusan bintang di langit dan menjadikannya terasa indah bagi orang-orang yang memandang (langit itu).

arabic: وَحَفِظْنٰهَا مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطٰنٍ رَّجِيْمٍۙ
transliteration_en: Wa hafiznaahaa min kulli Shaitaanir rajeem
transliteration_id: Wa ḥafiẓnāhā min kulli syaiṭānir rajīm(in).
translation_en: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
translation_id: Kami menjaganya dari setiap setan yang terkutuk,

arabic: اِلَّا مَنِ اسْتَرَقَ السَّمْعَ فَاَتْبَعَهٗ شِهَابٌ مُّبِيْنٌ
transliteration_en: Illaa manis taraqas sam'a fa atba'ahoo shihaabum mubeen
transliteration_id: Illā manistaraqas-sam‘a fa atba‘ahū syihābum mubīn(un).
translation_en: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
translation_id: kecuali (setan) yang mencuri-curi (berita) yang dapat didengar (dari malaikat) maka dia dikejar oleh bintang-bintang (berapi) yang terang.

arabic: وَالْاَرْضَ مَدَدْنٰهَا وَاَلْقَيْنَا فِيْهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَاَنْۢبَتْنَا فِيْهَا مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ مَّوْزُوْنٍ
transliteration_en: Wal arda madadnaahaa wa alqainaa feehaa rawaasiya wa ambatnaa feehaa min kulli shai'im mawzoon
transliteration_id: Wal-arḍa madadnāhā wa alqainā fīhā rawāsiya wa ambatnā fīhā min kulli syai'im mauzūn(in).
translation_en: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
translation_id: Kami telah menghamparkan bumi, memancangkan padanya gunung-gunung, dan menumbuhkan di sana segala sesuatu menurut ukuran(-nya).

arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيْهَا مَعَايِشَ وَمَنْ لَّسْتُمْ لَهٗ بِرٰزِقِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa ja'alnaa lakum feehaa ma'aayisha wa mal lastum lahoo biraaziqeen
transliteration_id: Wa ja‘alnā lakum fīhā ma‘āyisya  wa mal lastum lahū birāziqīn(a).
translation_en: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
translation_id: Kami telah menjadikan di sana sumber-sumber kehidupan untukmu dan (menjadikan pula) makhluk hidup yang bukan kamu pemberi rezekinya.

arabic: وَاِنْ مِّنْ شَيْءٍ اِلَّا عِنْدَنَا خَزَاۤىِٕنُهٗ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهٗٓ اِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُوْمٍ
transliteration_en: Wa im min shai'in illaa 'indanaa khazaaa 'inuhoo wa maa nunazziluhooo illaa biqadarim ma'loom
transliteration_id: Wa im min syai'in illā ‘indanā khazā'inuhū wa mā nunazziluhū illā biqadarim ma‘lūm(un).
translation_en: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
translation_id: Tidak ada sesuatu pun melainkan di sisi Kamilah perbendaharaannya dan Kami tidak menurunkannya melainkan dengan ukuran tertentu.

arabic: وَاَرْسَلْنَا الرِّيٰحَ لَوَاقِحَ فَاَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاۤءِ مَاۤءً فَاَسْقَيْنٰكُمُوْهُۚ وَمَآ اَنْتُمْ لَهٗ بِخٰزِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa arsalnar riyaaha la waaqiha fa anzalnaa minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa asqai naakumoohu wa maaa antum lahoo bikhaazineen
transliteration_id: Wa arsalnar-riyāḥa lawāqiha fa anzalnā minas-samā'i mā'an fa asqainākumūh(u), wa mā antum lahū bikhāzinīn(a).
translation_en: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
translation_id: Kami telah meniupkan angin untuk mengawinkan. Maka, Kami menurunkan hujan dari langit lalu memberimu minum dengan (air) itu, sedangkan kamu bukanlah orang-orang yang menyimpannya.

arabic: وَاِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْيٖ وَنُمِيْتُ وَنَحْنُ الْوٰرِثُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa innnaa la nahnu nuhyee wa numeetu wa nahnul waarisoon
transliteration_id: Wa innā lanaḥnu nuḥyī wa numītu wa naḥnul-wāriṡūn(a).
translation_en: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Kamilah yang menghidupkan dan mematikan serta Kami (pulalah) yang mewarisi.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا الْمُسْتَقْدِمِيْنَ مِنْكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا الْمُسْتَأْخِرِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa la qad 'alimnal mustaqdimeena minkum wa laqad 'alimnal mustaakhireen
transliteration_id: Wa laqad ‘alimnal-mustaqdimīna minkum wa laqad ‘alimnal-musta'khirīn(a).
translation_en: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar mengetahui orang-orang yang terdahulu di antara kamu dan Kami mengetahui pula orang-orang yang terkemudian.

arabic: وَاِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْۗ اِنَّهٗ حَكِيْمٌ عَلِيْمٌ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Wa inna Rabbaka Huwa yahshuruhum; innahoo Hakeem 'Aleem
transliteration_id: Wa inna rabbaka huwa yaḥsyuruhum, innahū ḥakīmun ‘alīm(un).
translation_en: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya hanya Tuhanmulah yang akan mengumpulkan mereka. Sesungguhnya Dia Maha Bijaksana lagi Maha Mengetahui.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْاِنْسَانَ مِنْ صَلْصَالٍ مِّنْ حَمَاٍ مَّسْنُوْنٍۚ
transliteration_en: Wa laqad khalaqnal insaana min salsaalim min hama im masnoon
transliteration_id: Wa laqad khalaqnal-insāna min ṣalṣālim min ḥama'im masnūn(in).
translation_en: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah menciptakan manusia (Adam) dari tanah liat kering dari lumpur hitam yang dibentuk.

arabic: وَالْجَاۤنَّ خَلَقْنٰهُ مِنْ قَبْلُ مِنْ نَّارِ السَّمُوْمِ
transliteration_en: Waljaaanna khalaqnaahu min qablu min naaris samoom
transliteration_id: Wal-jānna khalaqnāhu min qablu min nāris-samūm(i).
translation_en: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
translation_id: Sebelumnya Kami telah menciptakan jin dari api yang sangat panas.

arabic: وَاِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةِ اِنِّيْ خَالِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّنْ صَلْصَالٍ مِّنْ حَمَاٍ مَّسْنُوْنٍۚ
transliteration_en: Wa iz qaala Rabbuka lilmalaaa' ikati innee khaaliqum basharam min salsaalim min hama im masnoon
transliteration_id: Wa iż qāla rabbuka lil-malā'ikati innī khāliqum basyaram min ṣalṣālim min ḥama'im masnūn(in).
translation_en: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
translation_id: (Ingatlah) ketika Tuhanmu berfirman kepada malaikat, “Sesungguhnya Aku akan menciptakan seorang manusia dari tanah liat kering dari lumpur hitam yang dibentuk.

arabic: فَاِذَا سَوَّيْتُهٗ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيْهِ مِنْ رُّوْحِيْ فَقَعُوْا لَهٗ سٰجِدِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fa izaa sawwaituhoo wa nafakhtu feehi mir roohee faqa'oo lahoo saajideen
transliteration_id: Fa iżā sawwaituhū wa nafakhtu fīhi mir rūḥī fa qa‘ū lahū sājidīn(a).
translation_en: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
translation_id: Maka, apabila Aku telah menyempurnakan (kejadian)-nya dan telah meniupkan roh (ciptaan)-Ku ke dalamnya, menyungkurlah kamu kepadanya dengan bersujud.”

arabic: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ اَجْمَعُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Fasajadal malaaa'ikatu kulluhum ajma'oon
transliteration_id: Fa sajadal-malā'ikatu kulluhum  ajma‘ūn(a).
translation_en: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
translation_id: Lalu, para malaikat itu bersujud semuanya bersama-sama,

arabic: اِلَّآ اِبْلِيْسَۗ اَبٰىٓ اَنْ يَّكُوْنَ مَعَ السّٰجِدِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Illaaa ibleesa abaaa ai yakoona ma'as saajideen
transliteration_id: Illā iblīs(a), abā ay yakūna ma‘as-sājidīn(a).
translation_en: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
translation_id: kecuali Iblis. Ia enggan ikut bersama para (malaikat) yang bersujud.

arabic: قَالَ يٰٓاِبْلِيْسُ مَا لَكَ اَلَّا تَكُوْنَ مَعَ السّٰجِدِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala yaaa Ibleesu maa laka allaa takoona ma'as saajideen
transliteration_id: Qāla yā iblīsu mā laka allā takūna ma‘as-sājidīn(a).
translation_en: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
translation_id: Dia (Allah) berfirman, “Wahai Iblis, apa yang menyebabkanmu enggan bersama mereka yang bersujud itu?”

arabic: قَالَ لَمْ اَكُنْ لِّاَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقْتَهٗ مِنْ صَلْصَالٍ مِّنْ حَمَاٍ مَّسْنُوْنٍ
transliteration_en: Qaala lam akul li asjuda libasharin khalaqtahoo min salsaalim min hama im masnoon
transliteration_id: Qāla lam akul li'asjuda libasyarin khalaqtahū min ṣalṣālim min ḥama'im masnūn(in).
translation_en: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
translation_id: Ia (Iblis) berkata, “Aku sekali-kali tidak akan bersujud kepada manusia yang Engkau ciptakan dari tanah liat kering dari lumpur hitam yang diberi bentuk.”

arabic: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَاِنَّكَ رَجِيْمٌۙ
transliteration_en: Qaala fakhruj minhaa fa innaka rajeem
transliteration_id: Qāla fakhruj minhā fa innaka rajīm(un).
translation_en: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
translation_id: (Allah) berfirman, “Keluarlah darinya (surga) karena sesungguhnya kamu terkutuk.

arabic: وَّاِنَّ عَلَيْكَ اللَّعْنَةَ اِلٰى يَوْمِ الدِّيْنِ
transliteration_en: Wa inna 'alikal la'nata ilaa Yawmid Deen
transliteration_id: Wa inna ‘alaikal-la‘nata ilā yaumid-dīn(i).
translation_en: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
translation_id: Sesungguhnya kamu terlaknat sampai hari Kiamat.”

arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَاَنْظِرْنِيْٓ اِلٰى يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Qaala Rabbi fa anzirneee ilaa Yawmi yub'asoon
transliteration_id: Qāla rabbi fa anẓirnī ilā yaumi yub‘aṡūn(a).
translation_en: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
translation_id: (Iblis) berkata, “Wahai Tuhanku, tangguhkanlah (usia)-ku sampai hari mereka (manusia) dibangkitkan.”

arabic: قَالَ فَاِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنْظَرِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Qaala fa innaka minal munzareen
transliteration_id: Qāla fa innaka minal-munẓarīn(a).
translation_en: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
translation_id: (Allah) berfirman, “Sesungguhnya kamu termasuk golongan yang ditangguhkan

arabic: اِلٰى يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُوْمِ
transliteration_en: Ilaa Yawmil waqtil ma'loom
transliteration_id: Ilā yaumil-waqtil-ma‘lūm(i).
translation_en: Until the Day of the time well-known."
translation_id: sampai hari yang telah ditentukan waktunya (kiamat).”

arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ اَغْوَيْتَنِيْ لَاُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ فِى الْاَرْضِ وَلَاُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa aghwaitanee la uzayyinaana lahum fil ardi wa la ughwiyan nahum ajma'een
transliteration_id: Qāla rabbi bimā agwaitanī la'uzayyinanna lahum fil-arḍi wa la'ugwiyannahum ajma‘īn(a).
translation_en: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
translation_id: Ia (Iblis) berkata, “Tuhanku, karena Engkau telah menyesatkanku, sungguh aku akan menjadikan (kejahatan) terasa indah bagi mereka di bumi dan sungguh aku akan menyesatkan mereka semua,

arabic: اِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Illaa 'ibaadaka minhumul mukhlaseen
transliteration_id: Illā ‘ibādaka minhumul-mukhlaṣīn(a).
translation_en: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
translation_id: kecuali hamba-hamba-Mu yang terpilih (karena keikhlasannya) di antara mereka.”

arabic: قَالَ هٰذَا صِرَاطٌ عَلَيَّ مُسْتَقِيْمٌ
transliteration_en: Qaala haaza Siraatun 'alaiya Mustaqeem
transliteration_id: Qāla hāżā ṣirāṭun ‘alayya mustaqīm(un).
translation_en: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
translation_id: Dia (Allah) berfirman, “Ini adalah jalan lurus yang Aku jamin (ditunjukkan kepada hamba-hamba-Ku itu).

arabic: اِنَّ عِبَادِيْ لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطٰنٌ اِلَّا مَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ الْغَاوِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Inna 'ibaadee laisa laka 'alaihim sultaanun illaa manittaba'aka minal ghaaween
transliteration_id: Inna ‘ibādī laisa laka ‘alaihim sulṭānun illā manittaba‘aka minal-gāwīn(a).
translation_en: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya kamu (Iblis) tidak kuasa atas hamba-hamba-Ku kecuali mereka yang mengikutimu, yaitu orang-orang yang sesat.”

arabic: وَاِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa inna jahannama lamaw'iduhum ajma'een
transliteration_id: Wa inna jahannama lamau‘iduhum  ajma‘īn(a).
translation_en: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya (neraka) Jahanam benar-benar (tempat) yang telah dijanjikan untuk mereka (pengikut setan) semua.

arabic: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ اَبْوَابٍۗ لِكُلِّ بَابٍ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌ مَّقْسُوْمٌ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Lahaa sab'atu abwaab; likulli baabim minhum juz'um maqsoom
transliteration_id: Lahā sab‘atu abwāb(in), likulli bābim minhum juz'um maqsūm(un).
translation_en: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
translation_id: Ia (Jahanam) mempunyai tujuh pintu. Setiap pintu (telah ditetapkan) untuk golongan tertentu dari mereka.

arabic: اِنَّ الْمُتَّقِيْنَ فِيْ جَنّٰتٍ وَّعُيُوْنٍۗ
transliteration_en: Innal muttaqeena fee Jannaatinw wa 'uyoon
transliteration_id: Innal-muttaqīna fī jannātiw wa ‘uyūn(in).
translation_en: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang bertakwa berada dalam (surga yang penuh) taman-taman dan mata air.

arabic: اُدْخُلُوْهَا بِسَلٰمٍ اٰمِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Udkhuloohaa bisalaamin aamineen
transliteration_id: Udkhulūhā bisalāmin āminīn(a).
translation_en: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
translation_id: (Allah berfirman,) “Masuklah ke dalamnya dengan sejahtera dan aman.”

arabic: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِيْ صُدُوْرِهِمْ مِّنْ غِلٍّ اِخْوَانًا عَلٰى سُرُرٍ مُّتَقٰبِلِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa naza'naa ma fee sudoorihim min ghillin ikhwaanan 'alaa sururim mutaqaabileen
transliteration_id: Wa naza‘nā mā fī ṣudūrihim min gillin ikhwānan ‘alā sururim mutaqābilīn(a).
translation_en: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
translation_id: Kami mencabut segala rasa dendam yang ada dalam hati mereka. Mereka bersaudara (dan) duduk berhadap-hadapan di atas dipan.

arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيْهَا نَصَبٌ وَّمَا هُمْ مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Laa yamas suhum feehaa nasabunw wa maa hum minhaa bimukhrajeen
transliteration_id: Lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabuw wa mā hum minhā bimukhrajīn(a).
translation_en: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
translation_id: Mereka tidak merasa lelah di dalamnya dan tidak akan dikeluarkan darinya.

arabic: ۞ نَبِّئْ عِبَادِيْٓ اَنِّيْٓ اَنَا الْغَفُوْرُ الرَّحِيْمُۙ
transliteration_en: Nabbi' 'ibaadeee annneee anal Ghafoorur Raheem
transliteration_id: Nabbi' ‘ibādī annī anal-gafūrur-raḥīm(u).
translation_en: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
translation_id: Kabarkanlah kepada hamba-hamba-Ku bahwa sesungguhnya Akulah Yang Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang

arabic: وَاَنَّ عَذَابِيْ هُوَ الْعَذَابُ الْاَلِيْمُ
transliteration_en: Wa anna 'azaabee uwal 'azaabul aleem
transliteration_id: Wa anna ‘ażābī huwal-‘ażābul-alīm(u).
translation_en: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
translation_id: dan bahwa sesungguhnya siksaan-Kulah azab yang sangat pedih.
